The technical composure of these docs is only temporary. It is acceptable to expect more features in the near future.

Thank you for your patience! - Matt Elliott

Introduction

Well, what is Cello? It's a light-weight quality assurance tracking web application. Manage your test cases, which can be organized into test suites and projects. Cello performs as a custom view of Trello, a well-maintained and thought-out documentation web application.

Entity Description

Project Description

Projects hold

Test Case List Screen

The test case list screen will most likely be your starting point. Here you can view your the test cases under the selected project, as well as filter them by a number of parameters. More info to come soon.
